title: Audio
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
custom_expected: Then the Audio EPG will be displayed

title: Game State Display
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user is viewing a date with live audio feeds available
custom_expected:
Then the games will be listed in the Audio EPG
with the game state marked as "Live"

title: Game State Display - Game Time
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a date with live audio feeds available
but the game has not started yet
custom_expected:
Then the game will be listed in the Audio EPG
along with the game time

title: Game State Display - Top Inning
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a date with live audio feeds available
and a game is currently in the top of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the game will be listed in the Audio EPG
with the current inning (ex. Top 7)

title: Game State Display - Bot Inning
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing a date with live audio feeds available
and a game is currently in the bottom of an inning
custom_expected:
Then the game will be listed in the Audio EPG
with the current inning (ex. Bot 7)

title: Game Matchup Display
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user is viewing a date with live audio feeds available
custom_expected: Then the game matchups will be listed as "Away Team" @ "Home Team"

title: Streaming - Wifi
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is on a Wifi connection
and taps on a game with live audio feeds
custom_expected: Then the default audio feed will launch

title: Streaming - Cellular
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is on a cellular connection
and taps on a game with live audio feeds
custom_expected: Then the default audio feed will launch

title: Current Feed Display
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and views the current feed display at the top
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:

"Now Playing"
Home @ Away
Current Feed call letters
Red Scrubber Bar with Time Elapsed and LIVE button
Back 10 icon, Pause icon, Forward 10 icon
Available feeds for that game, with team and language distinction

title: Display when User Changes Dates During Playback
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and then changes the date via date picker
custom_expected: Then the current feed display should now include the game's date

title: Switching Feeds - Same Game
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user has launched a live audio feed
and taps to switch to another feed option from the same game
custom_expected: Then the feeds should change seamlessly

title: Switching Feeds - Different Game
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user has launched a live audio feed
and taps to switch to another game's feeds
custom_expected:
Then the feeds should change seamlessly
and the game data should update accordingly

title: Date Picker
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the date bar
custom_expected: Then the date picker should display

title: Date Picker - Selecting New Date
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the date bar
and selects a new date
custom_expected:
Then the date bar and Audio menu should update accordingly
and should reflect the schedule of that newly selected date

title: Forward/Backward Date Arrows
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the forward and backward arrows from the date bar
custom_expected:
Then the date bar and Audio menu should update accordingly
and should reflect the schedule of that newly selected date

title: Deep Link Logic - "Favorite Team" Setting - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has team set as "Favorite Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the home team

ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Phillies @ Mets
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Favorite Team" Setting - Away Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Favorite Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the away team
 
ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Mets @ Phillies
custom_expected: Then the away feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Followed Team" Setting - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Followed Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the home team

ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Phillies @ Mets

(make sure the opposing team isn't the user's Favorite team or a Followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Followed Team" Setting - Away Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Followed Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the away team
 
ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Mets @ Phillies

(make sure the opposing team isn't the user's Favorite team or a Followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the away feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which none of their Teams are playing
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic -  Device in Spanish
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
and the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user taps the game matchup of a game with Spanish feeds
custom_expected:
Then the home Spanish feed should start playing by default

and if the home team does not have a Spanish feed, but the away team does, 
then the away Spanish feed should start playing by default

title: Scrubber Bar
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and re-adjusts the scrubber bar
custom_expected:
Then the audio should playback from the newly selected point in the feed's duration
and the scrubber should now be white (if app is in dark mode) or black (if app is in light mode)
and the LIVE button should now be highlighted white (if app is in dark mode) or black (if app is in light mode)

title: Scrubber Bar - Live Button
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and has scrubbed back
and taps the LIVE button
custom_expected:
Then the audio should playback from the most live point
and the scrubber should now be red
and the LIVE button should now be un-highlighted and include a red dot

title: Forward 10 - Live Point
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and is at the most live point
and taps the Forward 10 button
custom_expected: Then the audio feed should remain at the most live point

title: Forward 10 - Scrubbed Back
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and has scrubbed back
and taps the Forward 10 button
custom_expected: Then the audio feed should fast forward 10 seconds

title: Back 10
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and taps the Back 10 button
custom_expected: Then the audio feed should skip backward 10 seconds

title: Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and taps the Pause icon
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the pause icon should turn into a Play icon

title: Resuming from Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and had previously paused the feed
and taps the Play icon
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should resume
and the play icon should turn back into a pause icon

title: Launching Another App's Audio During Playback
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to a live audio feed
and the user launches audio from another app on the device
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the new app's audio should begin

title: Launching MLB Audio During Playback of Other App's Audio
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to audio from another app on the device
and taps to launch an audio feed from the MLB app Audio EPG
custom_expected:
Then the other app's audio feed should pause
and the MLB app's audio should begin

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback > News Articles
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has autoplay enabled
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user opens a news article that includes video tokens
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should continue to play
and the video should not autoplay

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback > News Articles - Tapping Video
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has autoplay enabled
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user opens a news article that includes video tokens
and the user taps the video
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the video from the news article should start playing with audio

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback - Team Page
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has autoplay enabled
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user opens a team page
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should continue to play
and the video should not autoplay

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback > Team Page - Tapping Video
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has autoplay enabled
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user opens a team page
and the user taps to play one of the videos from the carousel
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the video's audio should begin to play in the playlist view

title: Feed Button Formatting
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to an audio feed
and notes the feed options from that game
custom_expected:
Then depending on how many feed options there, the buttons should be formatted accordingly

(max of 4 feed buttons)

title: Backgrounding App
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user backgrounds the app
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Lock Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user locks the screen of the device
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Lock Screen Content
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user locks the screen of the device
and taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the following:

MLB app logo
Home & Away
Team - Feed call letters
Back 30, Stop, Forward 30

title: Lock Screen - Forward 30
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Forward 30 button
custom_expected: Then the audio should skip forwards 30 seconds

title: Lock Screen - Back 30
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Back 30 button
custom_expected: Then the audio should skip backwards 30 seconds

title: Lock Screen - Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Pause button
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the Pause icon should turn back into a Play icon

title: Lock Screen - Resume from Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user is on the lock screen
and has previously paused the feed
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should resume playback
and the Play icon should turn back into a Pause icon

title: Device Goes to Sleep
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the device's display goes to sleep
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Deep Link Logic - "Favorite Team" Setting - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has team set as "Favorite Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the home team

ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Phillies @ Mets
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Favorite Team" Setting - Away Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Favorite Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the away team
 
ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Mets @ Phillies
custom_expected: Then the away feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Followed Team" Setting - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Followed Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the home team

ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Phillies @ Mets

(make sure the opposing team isn't the user's Favorite team or a Followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - "Followed Team" Setting - Away Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and has a team set as "Followed Team"
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which their Team is the away team
 
ex. setting Mets as My Team, and matchup is Mets @ Phillies

(make sure the opposing team isn't the user's Favorite team or a Followed team ranked higher)
custom_expected: Then the away feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic - Home Team
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps: When the user taps the game matchup of a game in which none of their Teams are playing
custom_expected: Then the home feed should start playing by default

title: Deep Link Logic -  Device in Spanish
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
and the device language is set to Spanish
custom_steps: When the user taps the game matchup of a game with Spanish feeds
custom_expected:
Then the home Spanish feed should start playing by default

and if the home team does not have a Spanish feed, but the away team does, 
then the away Spanish feed should start playing by default

custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account

custom_steps:

and re-adjusts the scrubber bar
custom_expected: Then the audio should playback from the newly selected point in the feed's duration

title: Launching MLB Audio During Playback of Other App's Audio
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to audio from another app on the device
and taps to launch an audio feed from the MLB app Audio EPG
custom_expected:
Then the other app's audio feed should pause
and the MLB app's audio should begin

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user opens a news article that includes video tokens
and the video begins to autoplay
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should continue to play
and the video from the news article should play without audio

title: Video Autoplay During Audio Playback - Tapping Video
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user opens a news article that includes video tokens
and the video begins to autoplay
and the user taps the video
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the video from the news article should start playing with audio

title: Feed Button Formatting
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and the user is viewing the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
When the user is listening to an audio feed
and notes the feed options from that game
custom_expected:
Then depending on how many feed options there, the buttons should be formatted accordingly

(max of 4 feed buttons)

title: Backgrounding App
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user backgrounds the app
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Lock Screen
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the user locks the screen of the device
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Lock Screen Content
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps:
When the user locks the screen of the device
and taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
custom_expected:
Then the user should see the following:

MLB app logo
Home & Away
Team - Feed call letters
Duration bar
Back 10, Pause, Forward 10
Volume Slider

title: Lock Screen - Forward 30
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Forward 30 button
custom_expected: Then the audio should skip forwards 30 seconds

title: Lock Screen - Back 30
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Back 30 button
custom_expected: Then the audio should skip backwards 30 seconds

title: Lock Screen - Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the screen to bring up the lock screen
and taps the Pause button
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should pause
and the Pause icon should turn back into a Play icon

title: Lock Screen - Resume from Pause
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
and has locked the screen
custom_steps:
When the user is on the lock screen
and has previously paused the feed
custom_expected:
Then the audio feed should resume playback
and the Play icon should turn back into a Pause icon

title: Device Goes to Sleep
custom_preconds:
Given the MLB app is installed
and the user is logged in with an Audio-entitled account
and is listening to an audio feed
custom_steps: When the device's display goes to sleep
custom_expected: Then the audio playback should continue

title: Lite User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a Lite (not-entitled) user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
custom_expected: Then the user will be prompted with the MLB Audio paywall

title: Logging in from Audio Paywall
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a Lite (not-entitled) user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
and logs in via the Audio paywall with an account entitled for Audio
custom_expected: Then the Audio EPG will open

title: Audio-Entitled User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When an Audio-entitled user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
custom_expected: Then the Audio EPG will display

title: TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a TV-entitled user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
custom_expected: Then the Audio EPG will display

title: Single Team User
custom_preconds: Given the MLB app is installed
custom_steps:
When a Single Team user launches the More Menu (via "More" in the bottom nav)
and selects "Audio" from Sections
custom_expected: Then the Audio EPG will display

title: Audacy Stream Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a live audio stream available to listen to
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio page by selecting "Audio" from the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user can locate the Stream request in Charles by searching for https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/

title: Audacy Call Sign
custom_preconds: GIVEN there is a live game available to listen to
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Audio page by selecting Audio from the more menu
custom_expected: THEN the user can find the call sign in Charles by searching for https://live.wostreaming.net/manifest/{audacyCallsign}.m3u8

title: Audacy Config Flag
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is listening to a live Audacy feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates Charles
custom_expected: THEN the user will see the mid-roll implementation behind a config flag.

title: Audacy Hide Scrubber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has entered the audio menu
AND the user selected a game with an Audacy feed
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Audacy feed on the Audio Page for that specific game
custom_expected:
THEN the scrubber will be hidden
AND the jump buttons will be hidden

title: Audio EPG Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The Audio EPG menu will drop down

AND

1. The user is able to view games in the past, present, and future by utilizing the < and > buttons

AND

1. The user receives successful playback of archived and live games selected

title: Successful Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app and selects a matchup
custom_expected:
THEN 

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. Their favorite team OR the home team feed will be prioritized

AND

1. The Spanish feed will be prioritized if the user has their device language set to Spanish

title: Feed Switching
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has logged into an account with Audio EPG entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user taps on the Audio EPG icon (Headphones) from the top-right of the app
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will receive playback of their selected game

AND

1. The user can switch audio feeds by selecting an alternative audio segment

AND

1. The user will receive successful playback of the new feed selected

title: Audio Player Controls
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio feed and receives successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user observes the player controls available on the EPG menu
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user is able to:

- FF and RW by 10 seconds
- Play and Pause the feed
- Scrub backwards and forwards
- Tap Live button if away from live point
- Change feeds
- User calendar date picker buttons

title: Background App
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user is listening to an audio feed in the MLB app
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user backgrounds the app and navigates to another app on their device
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues 

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop unless audio from another app begins playback

title: Device To Sleep
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The user puts their device to sleep
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The user will still receive audio playback without an issues

AND

1. The audio feed does not pause or stop

title: Ad Drops
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between inning's or half innings
custom_expected:
THEN

1. Advertisement playback will begin

AND

1. The user will not hear any audio from the ballpark

title: Return To Game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The game goes to a commercial break whether it's between innings or half innings

AND

1. Game playback is about to resume
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The commercial break will end 

AND

1. Audio playback of the game will resume without the user missing a play

title: Ad Volume
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

1. The user has launched an audio stream and has received successful playback
custom_steps:
WHEN

1. The audio stream has entered an ad break
custom_expected:
THEN

1. The advertisement volume should not be significantly lower or louder than the game playback volume

title: Playback of Favorited Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has a team favorited in their app settings
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Launching a live or archived audio stream from the audio EPG menu that features the favorited team
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The favorited team's audio stream should begin playback on initial launch (Home or Away)

title: Playback of Followed Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has a team followed in their app settings
custom_steps:
WHEN 

+ Launching a live or archived audio stream from the audio EPG menu that features the followed team
custom_expected:
THEN 

+ The followed team's audio stream should begin playback on initial launch (Home or Away)

title: Playback of Multiple Followed Teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user has multiple teams followed in their app settings

AND

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG to launch an audio-only stream
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches a game that features two followed teams
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The home stream will begin playback at initial launch

title: Playback of National Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has a favorited team that is playing in a national broadcast game
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG menu

AND

+ Launches the national broadcast stream
custom_expected:
THEN

+ Playback will begin successfully (One Stream)

title: Matchup with one Pregame/Postgame
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The User does not have a favorited team 

AND

+ The user navigates to the Audio EPG
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ A game has an audio stream for a pre-game or a postgame
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user should playback the live stream (Home or Away) that has the pre-game or postgame

AND

+ The archived stream should not launch initially.

title: Matchup with two Pregames/Postgames
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 

+ The user does not have a favorited team in their app settings
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Launching an audio-only stream from the Audio EPG

AND

+ The game mhas two pregames or two postgames
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The initial launch should play back the home broadcast

title: Matchup without a pregame or postgame
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user does not have a favorited team saved
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed for a matchup without a pregame or postgame
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The home feed should play after initial launch

title: Playback of National Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user does not have a favorited team saved in their app settings
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed for a game that is nationally broadcasted
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The national feed should begin playback

title: Spanish Broadcasts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has their device language set to Spanish
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio feed from the Audio EPG (Live or Archived)
custom_expected:
THEN

+ If available, the Spanish broadcast will begin play back after initial launch

AND

+ If the user has a favorited team in the audio-only stream

THEN

+ The favorited team's spanish broadcast should begin playback after initial launch

title: Games Without Alternate Spanish Broadcasts
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user has their device set to Spanish
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ The user launches an audio-only stream without any alternate spanish broadcasts available to listen to
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The home stream should begin playback after initial launch

OR

+ The favorited team's audio broadcast should begin playback after initial launch (Away or Home)
